root.message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 16-5-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: A detailed manual and guide on the Enterprise Surveys implementation is found here (https://www.enterprisesurveys.org/content/dam/enterprisesurveys/documents/methodology/Enterprise%20Surveys_Manual%20and%20Guide.pdf). This manual provides a comprehensive overview of the quality management of the Enterprise Surveys.
